document.full_text: a california congressional seat will be contested in a runoff vote between a democratic los angeles city councilwoman and a republican businessman, after a third challenger conceded defeat on thursday.
document.title: california republican to be in congressional runoff vote
lines_and_colors: a california congressional seat will be contested in a runoff vote between a democratic los angeles city councilwoman and a republican businessman, after a third challenger conceded defeat on thursday.
